title: Break down language barriers with Babbel — just $170 through Jan. 28
content:
Macworld

Communication is key. And that’s especially true in business where, more so today than ever, it’s necessary to communicate with people from other countries. Looking for an easier way to break down language barriers? Then you need to try Babbel. A lifetime subscription is on sale for just $169.97 through January 28th only. 

With Babbel, everything is broken down into short, easily digestible lessons that are only 10 to 15 minutes long. That means you can learn a new language with Babbel faster than you could by using any other type of training.

Learning with Babbel is way more effective than you might think at first glance. Babbel uses speech recognition tech that ensures you not only understand written text but are also able to speak it accurately as well.

You can learn up to 14 different languages, and the lessons are available to you 24/7. And it works, which is why Babbel has over 10 million worldwide users.

Get a lifetime subscription to the Babbel Language Learning app for the special sale price of just $169.97 (reg. $599) until 11:59 pm PT on January 28.
